name: engines-checker
description: outdated versions checker for Node.js engines

scripts.publish:major: git checkout master && git pull && npm version major && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'publish major update' && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: git checkout master && git pull && npm version minor && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'publish minor update' && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: git checkout master && git pull && npm version patch && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'publish patch update' && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Ryonkmr
